title: Diet Therapy
description: Our greatest asset is our food. The food we eat should be the medicine for us. Depending on this theory, we are providing nutritious food for our patients. The main food chart includes...

title: Yoga
description: Yoga provides both physical and mental health. Yoga is a system of health science that has been contributed by India after many observations, thoughts, and experiments....

title: Steam Bath
description: This is the process of placing the patient in a specially equipped cabin and exposing steam with the correct temperature to sweat the body (10–15 minutes).

title: Hip Bath
description: Usually known as an abdominal bath. Therapeutic method of soaking the patient's abdomen by filling a specially prepared container with water.
